briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Adalimumab in Subjects With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study of the Human Anti-TNF Monoclonal Antibody Adalimumab for the Induction and Maintenance of Clinical Remission in Subjects With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis
summary: This was a Phase 3, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of the human anti-tumor necrosis factor (TNF) monoclonal antibody adalimumab (ADA) in patients with moderately to severely active ulcerative colitis (UC).

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Who Achieved Clinical Remission Per Mayo Score at Week 8
